app.title: IMGIT AI Art, Avatar Generator
app.description:
Unleash Your Imagination with IMGIT – Your Ultimate AI Image and Headshot Generator!

Transform your ideas into stunning works of Art with IMGIT, the most powerful AI-driven image and Headshot generator right at your fingertips. Whether you're a seasoned artist or just starting your creative journey, IMGIT is designed to inspire and enhance your creativity.

► Turn Words Into Artworks
Transform your text into stunning visual masterpieces with just a few taps. Simply describe your vision, enter a prompt and watch as the AI brings it to life in seconds.

► Create AI Characters
Design unique and compelling characters tailored for your stories, games or personal projects. Customize every detail to match your creative vision.

► Reimagine your Images
Give your photos a fresh, new look by applying different artistic styles. From classic portraits to modern digital art, reinvent your images effortlessly.

► Create designs for your Products or Advertisements
Craft eye-catching designs for your products, ads or branding materials. Generate professional-grade visuals that stand out and captivate your audience.

► Generate Tattoos & Logos
Design unique tattoos and logos with the power of AI. Whether you're looking for inspiration or a final design, create iconic images that tell your story.

► Update Social Media Profile Photos
Refresh your online presence with eye-catching new profile photos. Choose from a variety of styles to make a lasting impression on your followers.

► Discover New Fashion Looks
Experiment with fashion by trying out different outfits, styles and accessories. See how different looks suit you before you buy or share your new style with friends.

► Experiment with Hairstyles & Makeup
Explore new hairstyles and makeup looks without the commitment. Find the perfect combination to express your unique personality or switch up your style.

Why Choose IMGIT?
- Perfectly Match Prompts and Styles
- Flawless Anatomy & Proportions
- Custom Aspect Ratios: 1x1, 2x3, 9x16, 5x4
- Ad-Free, Watermark-Free Creations
- Commercial Use Allowed
- Free Daily Generations!

Unlock your creative potential and effortlessly explore new ideas, styles, and possibilities with IMGIT.

We’re committed to making IMGIT the best tool for your creative needs. Your feedback is invaluable to us - reach out anytime at imgit@tapnetic.ai.

IMGIT – Imagine. Create. Inspire.

Privacy Policy: https://tapnetic.ai/2022/11/24/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://tapnetic.ai/2022/11/24/terms-of-use

app.summary: Turn your words into images, design stunning portraits from your selfie photos.

reviews.text: A beautiful application that adds to the pictures an attractive and wonderful character, by improving the shape and quality of the pictures and adding some excitement to them. I liked that there are 10 free opportunities, the ease of use of the application, support is available 24 hours, and the interface is nice. You write your opinion on ideas, and the application implements them accurately and professionally. Artificial intelligence is a big, beautiful and motivating boost to a bright future.

During my first experience with the application, I liked it and was drawn to the new effects of images designed by artificial intelligence. This was interesting. The application is smooth in navigation and has few programming errors. It is an exciting experience.
reviews.replyText: Thanks for your feedback. We are continuously working on adding more features to our app to make your experience better.

reviews.text: I love that there are a lot of options available for lighting, etc, though only 2 for the main one. I forget at the moment. I don't like there's only 10 a day unless paid. I can't afford pro, so that sucks & when rendering ends up extra limbs or contorted faces, or nothing like prompts, etc, that counts as 1. One 30 sec ad + 10 more + again, would be great! I'm trying out several AI's & not sure if quality, richness, saturation is on their end or my prompt settings.

Update: There is a learning curve! That's exciting. The app still needs a lot of work, but the prompt samples are really helpful. Kudos for that! I'm hoping there's a learning curve and I didn't just get ripped off. Added detail, filters, keywords, negative keywords, uploaded an image, but it gives me something very different and won't produce more than one single image. I'm gonna need more or I'm gonna need my money back. Stay tuned...

During my experience with this application, I found that it is excellent and the features available in it are very wonderful. I also loved the quality of the images and the amazing design. What I liked most is the ease of use for someone who is a beginner in this field. I believe that this application should be essential in every phone! Thank you so much for this amazing app.
reviews.replyText: Dear friend, we are really glad that you like our product. Your support and voice are very important to us!

reviews.text: This app has promise. There are really cool aspects to the app as well. You can see the effects clearly in thumbnails, and it has tons of options, different effects (4k/8k/cinematic/ect). When the app returns results, they're pretty good. Now the bad. Many results returned black results. As in black pictures... which is silly. Like a red circle on a blue square? Black picture. Sometimes, it works, and sometimes it doesn't.

Good points about app is it's good value. I paid for one year only £17 and it has lots of options, styles, lighting. But it's not that fast, only creates one image and it's really fussy about text prompts and creates blank images. Needs a good tutorial to to help use it. The random prompt generator is great idea and really useful. Has alot potential but not as easy to use as other apps.

IMGIT Art & Headshot Generator is an amazing app that allows you to create stunning AI-generated art and professional headshots with just a few clicks. The app features a user-friendly interface, making it easy for anyone to use, regardless of their artistic skills. With a vast selection of art styles and customization options, you can create unique and captivating images that are perfect for social media, website banners, and more.
reviews.replyText: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!

reviews.text: The AI app market is oversaturated with mostly worthless apps at this point, but I'd be willing to argue about 9 out of 10 text to image AI apps can not only provide better results than this app, but can do so without a 10 image and 3 filter limit for free users. TLDR, this app is a waste of your time and a waste of your precious phone memory in a space filled with plenty of other amazing free apps and websites to choose from.

Only works sometimes. I went ahead and got the one year plan because I thought it was super cool, now it will sit on the downloading screen for ever and will never generate an image. Then after some time it might work again for a photo or two, then stop working.

app.recentChanges: Added more free generations and famous filters. Also improved image quality and performance!
app.AIReview:
IMGIT AI Art, Avatar Generator Review

Overview

IMGIT AI Art, Avatar Generator is an iOS application aiming to democratize art creation through artificial intelligence. With over 689,365 total installs and a solid 4.12 average rating from 26,606 users, it’s clearly attracting a significant audience seeking easy-to-use tools for generating images based on text prompts. The app positions itself as an ‘ultimate AI image and headshot generator,’ catering to both casual creatives and those looking for quick avatar creation solutions. Priced at free with in-app purchases, IMGIT offers a compelling entry point into the world of AI art generation but comes with certain limitations that users should be aware of. This review will delve into the app’s functionality, usability, and overall value proposition to help potential users determine if it meets their needs.

Key Features

IMGIT boasts several core features centered around text-to-image generation:

  • Text-to-Image Generation: The primary function is converting user-provided text descriptions into visual images. Users input a prompt – ranging from simple (“a cat wearing sunglasses”) to complex ("a cyberpunk cityscape at sunset, neon lights, detailed").
  • Avatar Creation (Headshots): The app allows users to upload a selfie and transform it into an avatar using AI style transfer. It offers various aesthetic styles for the generated avatars.
  • Style Presets: IMGIT provides a selection of pre-defined art styles like "Fantasy," “Cartoon,” "Oil Painting," and "Anime." Users can select a style to influence the output image.
  • Customization Options (Limited): Users have basic control over aspects like resolution, aspect ratio, and seed values for generating variations of an image.
  • Image History: The app maintains a history of generated images, allowing users to revisit previous creations or experiment with similar prompts.
  • Community Feed: A limited community feed allows users to share their generated artwork, fostering engagement and potentially inspiring new prompts.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: IMGIT’s interface is remarkably intuitive. The process of entering a prompt and generating an image is streamlined, making it accessible even for those with no prior experience in AI art generation or design.
  • Quick Results: The app generates images relatively quickly, typically within seconds, providing immediate feedback to the user's prompts. This rapid iteration is crucial when experimenting with different creative ideas.
  • Diverse Styles: The variety of pre-defined styles – from realistic painting to cartoonish depictions – expands the possibilities for image generation significantly. Users can explore a wide range of artistic aesthetics without needing advanced design skills.
  • High Install Count: The large install base (689,365) indicates substantial user interest and potentially successful marketing efforts.

Areas for Improvement

  • Prompt Sensitivity: The app’s response to prompts can be inconsistent. Simple prompts often yield impressive results, but more complex or nuanced descriptions may require significant tweaking to achieve the desired outcome. The AI seems particularly sensitive to specific keywords.
  • Limited Customization: While basic customization options are present, they feel restrictive. More granular control over parameters like color palettes, lighting, and composition would significantly enhance creative flexibility.
  • Image Quality (Variable): The quality of generated images can vary considerably based on the prompt complexity and potentially, the server load at the time of generation. Some outputs appear blurry or lacking detail.
  • Community Feed Limitations: The community feed is currently underdeveloped and lacks features like liking or commenting which would enhance user interaction.
  • Lack of Advanced Features: Compared to some competing AI art generators, IMGIT lacks advanced features such as negative prompts (specifying what not to include in the image) or the ability to blend multiple styles seamlessly.

User Experience

The app’s UX is generally positive and focused on simplicity. The single-screen interface minimizes clutter and directs users immediately to the core generation process. Navigating between the different style presets is straightforward. However, the limited customization options can feel frustrating for users seeking precise control over their creations. The initial loading times when generating images can be slightly longer than anticipated, particularly with complex prompts. The overall flow of creating an avatar from a selfie is simple and intuitive, but the quality of the output can vary significantly depending on the selfie's lighting and clarity.

Value for Money

IMGIT is offered entirely free of charge, which is a significant advantage for users exploring AI art generation. However, in-app purchases are available to unlock premium features like higher resolution image downloads, removal of watermarks, and potentially access to exclusive styles or models. The value proposition hinges on whether users find the free version sufficient for their needs, or if they’re willing to invest in premium features to enhance their creative workflow. The pricing model should be considered carefully – the core functionality is good but not exceptional enough to warrant immediate payment without trying out the free tier first.

Conclusion

IMGIT AI Art, Avatar Generator presents a compelling entry point into the exciting world of AI image generation. Its intuitive interface, quick results, and diverse style options make it accessible for both beginners and casual users. While the app has limitations in terms of customization, prompt sensitivity, and potentially image quality consistency, its free availability makes it an excellent tool for experimentation and creative exploration. With continued development focusing on improving prompt handling, expanding customization controls, and refining image generation algorithms, IMGIT has the potential to become a truly powerful and engaging AI art generator. Users should view this app as a fun and accessible way to play with AI-powered creativity rather than a professional-grade tool – it excels in that role.
